name: Five Raccoons at Bosco's
description:
You are the last employee in this establishment... 

Wild raccoons are hungry. Protect the food. And the garbage, too.

-----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:
A and D to rotate player
SPACE BAR to open and close the Camera Tab
MOUSE CLICK on camera names to navigate between the rooms
MOUSE CLICK on door buttons to close barriers and turn on lights

-----------------------------------------------
